title: ReferencePerformanceTestProcedure
description: The RPT typically involves a series of charge and discharge cycles under controlled conditions. Measurements are taken at regular intervals to track changes in performance metrics such as capacity and internal resistance.

description*.en: The RPT typically involves a series of charge and discharge cycles under controlled conditions. Measurements are taken at regular intervals to track changes in performance metrics such as capacity and internal resistance.
description*.de: Das RPT umfasst in der Regel eine Reihe von Lade- und Entladezyklen unter kontrollierten Bedingungen. In regelmäßigen Abständen werden Messungen vorgenommen, um Veränderungen der Leistungskennzahlen wie Kapazität und Innenwiderstand zu verfolgen.
